attributes.title: Avataar (A Discourse delivered at Inner Awakening & LBE)
attributes.description: From the works of Living Enlightened Master Paramahamsa Nithyananda.  In this discourse delivered during the recently concluded Inner Awakening Program for Enlightenement, Swamiji tells us that all of us are Avataars.  When we created this body we pick up prarabhda from sanjitha.  From which body we pick up prarabdha decides whether we play the role of bound soul or that of an Avataar.  If you are not conscious you will not have a choice to pick up the prarabdha.  When you pick up the best samskaras from all your past births you are an avataar purush.  The next Inner Awakening program will be held in Bidadi, India from December 2-22, 2009.  Please visit www.dhyanapeetam.org.
